text: I was very disappointed when I went to pick up my pizza, to find that none of the employees were wearing masks, there was no "social distancing" and the kitchen visible from the drive thru window looked pretty dirty. The girl who answered the window nearly stuck her mask-less face right into my car/own face. Not cool. I won't be back.

text: I'm a truck driver and was currently staying at the truckstop across from McDonald's and called in to see if they come here... His exact words were "Only for employees that worked there." Dont know what difference it made if I worked here or not... Alright that cool, you don't want my business... I'll go elsewhere...

text: I like this hungry howies because it's close to my house, their pizza is always ready fast, and it's delicious. The store is easy to get to, its always clean and the employees are usually very fun and friendly.

text: I ordered a stuffed crust cheese pizza for my daughter last night on New Year's eve  and it took 2 1/2 hours to get it and she said the pizza was so cold it was nast .  What a huge disappointment.  I called twice and all they could tell me is they were busy.  If your busy don't make the pizza before it can be delivered.
